About.title: About Me
About.description: For the past three years, I have worked as a frontend developer.

experience.title: Indra
experience.experience: Currently, I am developing web and mobile components for the BBVA bank platform.

experience.title: Endava
experience.experience:
Achieved objective: Together with my team, we created a web application for customer self-management for the Coign credit card, a fintech company in the United States.
 Objective result: The customer self-management application has managed to significantly reduce customer management costs, allowing the company to invest more money in marketing.
